title: Blork the orc
data:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Blork the orc''' is a unique [[orc]]ish spellcaster who can cast a few low-level [[Conjurations]] and buff himself significantly. He occasionally spawns with a strong weapon, like a [[battleaxe]] or [[glaive]].

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:4-6

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Blork is basically a beefier [[orc wizard]]. He has more attack spells and [[Haste]], but lacks [[Confuse]]. Because he can haste himself, it's more difficult to run away. Otherwise, unless he spawns with a big weapon, you can treat him like a strong orc wizard.
*If you worship [[Beogh]], he may join you as a follower.

==Trivia==
*Blork the orc is a reference to Mork from Ork, a rainbow-suspenders-wearing alien from the 70's television show "[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mork_%26_Mindy Mork & Mindy]".
*If you [[polymorph]] him, his name will change accordingly (e.g. he might become Blork the [[centaur]]).

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|Blork the orc will become '''Blorkula the orcula''', a vampire that splits into multiple randomly-colored vampire bats when he dies. Additionally:}}
**He will gain the [[Sting]], [[Sandblast]], and [[Shock]] spells. [[Cantrip]] and [[Magic Dart]] will be removed from his spell list.
**He will gain a second attack with the vampiric [[attack flavour]].
**He will spawn in D:5-8 instead of D:4-6.
*Prior to [[0.27]], he could cast [[Invisibility]] when low on health.
